extendedInfo.description: StageHand is an application that allows easy dip switch and light beam calculations for stage hands or anyone with an interest in lighting equipment.  We have added a bunch of tools and reference materials, like a color calculator, pin outs, watts to amps converter, and more!Keywords:Leko, beam, degree, ETC, barrel, distance, throw, lighting, stage, theatre, calculator, dip switch, dip switch calculator, dmx calculator, dmx, xlr, pinouts, pinout, lee, rosco, gam, gel, color, swatch, comparison**Permissions for internet and network access are used only for google analytics**NOTE - i'm sorry if anybodys having issues with language translation - i'm getting some weird packaging errors with roboguice and the internationalization stuff - i'm trying to get this fixed right now

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: A good app with really good potential, but i wouldn\'t have bought it if I\'d known there\'s no metric conversion! Come on guys there\'s people in the theatre business outside the states you know, and a very big percentage work in metric units...mm, metres, mm2 for cables, 415v for 3 phase etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where\'s the gel list?
reviews.comment: So, over a year later, finally an upgrade, and no gel comparison section.  Still a \"coming soon\"?  C\'mon man, let\'s get this finished.  I appreciate this program, I really do, but...
reviews.author: A Google User
